duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement the Corporate Engagement team’s research plan.
Oversee and manage CE’s team of research analysts, research projects, and vendor relationships.
Act as CE’s go-to expert on alternative protein market insights and support engagement and presentation efforts.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business, market research, marketing, statistics, psychology, sociology, communications, or similar is preferred; Master’s degree is a plus.
